sentences.cn: 不过她骨子里还得算是个听话的.

sentences.en: Can telomere maintenance be eliminated effectively ( and selectively ) enough by more tractable approaches?
sentences.cn: 端粒维持可以由足够有效地 ( 或选择性地 ) 更易控制的途径而有效地被排除 吗 ?

sentences.en: Carrie seemed quite tractable, and he congratulated himself.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉看上去很温顺, 他暗自感到庆幸.

sentences.en: Gold and silver are tractable metals.
sentences.cn: 金和银是容易加工的金属.

sentences.en: Had the Trader worked as planned, Web Services, as currently envisaged, would be far more tractable.
sentences.cn: 当做计画让商人工作, 网络服务, 当做现在面对, 会是遥远地更易于管教的.

sentences.en: He could easily manage his tractable and worshipping younger brother.
sentences.cn: 他能轻而易举地管住听话并且崇拜自己的弟弟。

sentences.en: He was always tractable and quiet.
It must be that the women are not so tractable as used to be!
sentences.cn: 因为工人已经不是从前的工人了!

sentences.en: Meanwhile, he is also provided with strong ideas of slavishness tractable , docilement, being worldly wise, etc.
sentences.cn: 同时, 他又循规蹈矩 、 驯顺服从 、 明哲保身, 具有浓厚的奴性意识.

sentences.en: Stener had always been very tractable.
sentences.cn: 斯坦纳总是容易对付的.

sentences.en: The bank's mission, on the other hand, now spans all the world's least tractable problems.
sentences.cn: 而另一方面, 世界银行的行动遍布世界各地, 即使最不起眼的问题中也有他们的身影.

sentences.en: The issues have proved to be less tractable than expected.
sentences.cn: 结果这些问题比预想的要难以处理。

sentences.en: Then they will be tractable, accept direction.
sentences.cn: 那样,人们就会易于控制, 接受领导.

sentences.en: They are mighty sagacious, tractable creature.
sentences.cn: 它们都是十分伶俐, 十分容易驾驭的动物.

sentences.en: Triangular matrices, in particular, are usually quite tractable.
sentences.cn: 特别地, 三角矩阵常是十分易于驾驭的.

words.tran_cn: 易于管教的；易驾驭的；易处理的；驯良的

trans.tran_cn: 易处理的，驯服的，温顺的，听话，驯良
trans.tran_en: easy to control or deal with
